data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Probles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from South Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Balueva, Ekaterina N., Kim, Ki-Beom, Lee, Jong-Wook (2013): Three new species of the genus Probles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from South Korea. ZooKeys 348: 77-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.6177, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.6177
